AASHTO CORE POLICY PRINCIPLES: Ensure timely reauthorization of along-term federal surfacetransportation bill
INFRASTRUCTURE INVESTMENT AND JOBS ACT K: Provides five years of federal funding and policystability from FY 2022 to 2026

AASHTO CORE POLICY PRINCIPLES: Enact a long-term, sustainablerevenue solution for the HighwayTrust Fund
INFRASTRUCTURE INVESTMENT AND JOBS ACT K: No revenue solution, though provides a $118 billionGeneral Fund transfer to HTF; Continues support ofstate user fee programs and creates a national userfee pilot program

AASHTO CORE POLICY PRINCIPLES: Increase and prioritize formula-based federal funding provided tostates
INFRASTRUCTURE INVESTMENT AND JOBS ACT K: 90 percent of total HTF highway funding is provided tostates via core formula programs, including two newprograms: Carbon Reduction and PROTECT (forresiliency)

AASHTO CORE POLICY PRINCIPLES: Increase flexibility, reduce programburdens, and improve projectdelivery
INFRASTRUCTURE INVESTMENT AND JOBS ACT K: Improves the environment review process by touchingup on NEPA, Section 4(f), and stewardship andoversight agreement, among others

AASHTO CORE POLICY PRINCIPLES: INFRASTRUCTURE INVESTMENT AND JOBS ACTKEY FEATURES
